sentences.en: a pinch of salt
sentences.cn: 一撮盐

sentences.en: any astrologer worth her salt would have predicted this.
sentences.cn: 任何一个称职的占星家都会预测到这一点。

sentences.en: Any coach worth his salt would do exactly as I did.
sentences.cn: 任何称职的教练都会采取和我一模一样的行动。

sentences.en: As with all dietary changes, reducing salt should be done gradually.
sentences.cn: 像所有改变饮食结构的情况一样，减少盐的摄入量也应当采取渐进的方式。

sentences.en: Common salt is made up of 40% sodium and 60% chloride.
sentences.cn: 食盐由40%的钠和60%的氯化物构成。

sentences.en: Could you pass the salt?
sentences.cn: 递一下盐好吗？

sentences.en: Dehydrated meals, soups and sauces contain a lot of salt.
sentences.cn: 脱水后的饭菜、汤和调味料中含有很多盐分。

sentences.en: I take anything he says with a large pinch of salt.
sentences.cn: 我对他所说的一切都要打个折扣。

sentences.en: Most of the people there are salt-of-the-earth, good, working-class people.
sentences.cn: 那里的大多数人都是吃苦耐劳、心地善良的工人阶级。

sentences.en: Prick the potatoes and rub the skins with salt.
sentences.cn: 将马铃薯戳一些洞，并用盐揉搓外皮。

sentences.en: Salt and Peppa are two streetwise and sassy girls from Queens.
sentences.cn: 索尔特和佩帕是两个来自皇后区的精明泼辣的女孩。

sentences.en: Salt the stock to your taste and leave it simmering very gently.
sentences.cn: 根据自己的口味给原汤加点盐，然后用文火慢炖。

sentences.en: Salt water is much more conductive than fresh water is.
sentences.cn: 盐水比淡水的传导性强得多。

sentences.en: Season with salt, pepper and a pinch of cayenne.
sentences.cn: 调以盐、胡椒和少许辣椒粉。

sentences.en: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place in the pan.
sentences.cn: 在肉上撒上盐，然后放进平底锅。

sentences.en: The meat is salted to store it through the winter.
sentences.cn: 肉用盐腌着以存放一冬。

sentences.en: The salt marshes and mud flats attract large numbers of waterfowl.
sentences.cn: 盐碱地和泥滩吸引了大量水鸟。

sentences.en: The scientific name for common salt is sodium chloride.
sentences.cn: 食盐的学名是氯化钠。

sentences.en: This might need some salt and pepper.
sentences.cn: 这里面也许要加点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.en: Too much salt masks the true flavour of the food.
sentences.cn: 太多的盐会盖住食物本来的味道。

sentences.en: Try gargling with salt water as soon as a cough begins.
sentences.cn: 一开始咳嗽就马上试着用盐水漱口。

words.tran_cn: 加盐于；使…增添兴趣；用盐腌制（salt的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: rub salt into the (或 someone's) wound
phrases.tran_cn: 在某人伤口上擦盐，使某人痛上加痛
盐析：通过向溶液中加盐而分离出（溶解的物质）
加盐使皂从碱液中分离出来

phrases.phrase: take something with a pinch (或grain) of salt

phrases.tran_cn: 社会中坚，最高尚的人，最值得信赖的人
胜任的，称职的，有能力的

trans.tran_cn: 含盐的，有咸味的，盐渍的
盐，风趣，机智，讽刺，药用盐，泻盐
trans.tran_en: a natural white mineral that is added to food to make it taste better or to preserve it

trans.tran_cn: 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化
trans.tran_en: to add salt to food to make it taste better

trans.tran_cn: 撒盐，用盐渍，加盐以调味，为…增加趣味
